content.p: If you have any questions or would like guidance on applying to the University, there are lots of ways to contact us. You can also connect with us through our social media channels for international and EU students. Our international student recruitment team supports EU and international students who are interesting in studying at the University of Nottingham UK. They provide expert admissions advice including guidance on qualifications. Staff regularly travel to countries around the world, meeting with applicants and their families. We also arrange campus visits if you are travelling to the UK. Our office hours are 9am to 4.30pm (UK time) from Monday to Friday. As well as our UK office, we have staff based in China, Ghana and Malaysia. We also work with official University of Nottingham representatives who assist applicants in many countries. Contacts for your country Meet in your country Visit us in Nottingham Our representatives Our international phone line is currently closed. If you have a question, use our enquiry form and we will reply to you soon. You can also email the international team directly at international-office@nottingham.ac.uk For specialist guidance, you may also find the following useful:
